common.collectDataConsentText: I am giving the Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Charles Univeristy (UFAL MFF UK) consent to collect my inputs and translations. The texts will be anonymized and may be used for future development of the system.
common.allowLocalHistoryText: Store new texts and translations into local history (on your device)

form.maybeUkrinian: Alphabet and language do not match
form.maybeCzech: Alphabet and language do not match

aboutUs.developedBy: The Translator was developed at the
aboutUs.UFAL: Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics
aboutUs.providingInterCorp: for providing us with InterCorp v14, a part of the project Czech National Corpus
aboutUs.forQuestionsContactUs: For any questions about this Translator, please contact

cookiesAndTermsDialog.title: Before you continue
cookiesAndTermsDialog.introduction: Anonymized usage data helps us improve the translation and understand its usecases.
cookiesAndTermsDialog.allowDataCollection: I am giving the Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Charles Univeristy (UFAL MFF UK) consent to collect my inputs and translations.
cookiesAndTermsDialog.allowCookies: I agree with the use of cookies for the purposes of traffic analysis and improvements to the web application.
cookiesAndTermsDialog.decisionCanBeChanged: You can change your preferences at any time in the application settings.
cookiesAndTermsDialog.nonCommercialUseOnly: Our translation services are intended for non-commercial use only. If you would like to use them in a commercial setting or you would like to have access to the API, please contact us via the email below.
